tasks.title: Add V2 Tables to Existing SQLite Database
tasks.description: Add 5 new tables to your existing spendsense.db SQLite database for goals, budgets, alerts, subscriptions, and health scores

tasks.testStrategy: Verify migrations run successfully. Test CRUD operations on all new tables. Ensure foreign key constraints work correctly. Validate indexes improve query performance.

subtasks.details: Define FinancialGoal, Budget, Alert, Subscription, and HealthScore models with proper relationships and validation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test model creation, relationships, and serialization.

subtasks.title: Add Database Indexes
subtasks.description: Create indexes for frequently queried columns
subtasks.details: Add indexes on user_id for all tables, created_at for alerts, status for goals/budgets, and computed_at for health scores.
subtasks.testStrategy: Run EXPLAIN queries to verify index usage. Benchmark query performance.

Create historical tracking and improvement suggestions. Build prominent dashboard display with component breakdown.
